message.entry: x- and y-coordinate cell arrays must be vectors of the same size.
Not enough input arguments. Specify y-coordinates as a cell array in the second argument.
x- and y-coordinate vectors must both be numeric or both be cell arrays.
Each x- and y-coordinate pair must have the same size with at least 3 elements.
Sparse arrays are not supported.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
x- and y-coordinates must be vectors of the same size with at least 3 elements.
x- and y-coordinate matrix must have 2 columns with at least 3 rows.
NaN placement in x- and y-coordinate vectors must be the same.
NaN placement in x- and y-coordinate matrix must be the same.
x- and y-coordinates must be real, numeric, and finite.
Unable to create polyshape because magnitudes of x- and y-coordinates are too large.
Too many input arguments.
Parameter name must be 'SolidBoundaryOrientation', 'Simplify' or 'KeepCollinearPoints'.
Parameter name must be 'SolidBoundaryOrientation', 'Simplify' or 'KeepCollinearPoints'.
'Simplify' value must be true or false.
'KeepCollinearPoints' value must be true or false.
'SolidBoundaryOrientation' value must be 'auto', 'ccw', or 'cw'.
Parameter name must be 'Simplify'.
Parameter name must be 'KeepCollinearPoints'.
Parameter name must be 'KeepCollinearPoints' or 'Simplify'.
Translation vector argument must be a 2-element row vector.
x- and y-element of translation vector must be 2 numeric scalars.
Translation vector elements must be real, finite, and numeric.
Scale center argument must be a 2-element row vector.
x- and y-coordinates of scale center must be real, finite, and numeric.
Scale factor must be a scalar or a 2-element row vector.
Scale factor value must be numeric, real, positive, and finite.
Rotation center argument must be a 2-element row vector.
x- and y-coordinates of rotation center must be real, finite, and numeric.
Angle of rotation must be a real, finite, and numeric scalar.
Unable to translate polyshape because translation vector is too large.
Unable to scale polyshape because scale factor is too large.
Unable to rotate polyshape because coordinates of the rotated polyshape are too large.
x- and y-coordinates of query points must be real and numeric.
x- and y-coordinates of query points must be real, finite, and numeric.
x- and y-coordinates of query points must have 2 columns.
x- and y-coordinates of query points must be vectors of the same size.
Boundary index argument is not supported when the first input argument is a polyshape array.
Boundary index elements must be positive integers less than or equal to the number of boundaries in the polyshape ({0}).
Reference point argument must be a 2-element row vector.
x- and y-coordinates of reference point must be real, finite, and numeric.
Invalid option combination. Specify a single option as either ''ascend'' or ''descend''.
Invalid option combination. Specify a single option as ''area'', ''perimeter'', ''numsides'', or ''centroid''.
Invalid option. Specify option as ''ascend'', ''descend'', ''area'', ''perimeter'', ''numsides'', or ''centroid''.
Parameter name must be ''ReferencePoint''.
Parameter ''ReferencePoint'' is only supported when ''centroid'' is specified.
First input argument must be of type polyshape.
Input argument must be a scalar polyshape object.
Input argument must be a vector of polyshape objects.
Parameter name must be 'JointType' or 'MiterLimit'.
'JointType' value must be 'miter' when 'MiterLimit' is specified.
'MiterLimit' value must be a real, numeric scalar no less than 2.
Arc tolerance must be a real number between 0 and 1.
Unable to offset polyshape because buffer distance is too large.
'JointType' value must be 'round', 'miter', or 'square'.
Buffer distance argument must be a numeric, real, and finite scalar.
Tolerance value must be a real, positive and finite scalar.
x- and y-coordinates of line argument must be real, finite, and numeric.
x- and y-coordinates of line argument must be a 2-column numeric array.
x- and y-coordinates of line argument must have at least 2 rows.
Second input argument must be a polyshape or a 2-column numeric array.
Parameter 'KeepCollinearPoints' has no effect when intersecting a polyline.
When input arguments are both rows or both columns, they must be the same length.
Input arrays must have the same size.
The number of inputs is wrong.
Empty polyshapes are not supported.
Not enough input arguments. Specify angle of rotation
Not enough input arguments. Specify scale factor.
First input polyshape has more than 1 boundary.
Second input polyshape has more than 1 boundary.
First input polyshape has an element with more than 1 boundary.
Second input polyshape has an element with more than 1 boundary.
Vertex mapping output arguments are only supported when both input polyshapes are scalars.
Polyshape has duplicate vertices, intersections, or other inconsistencies that may produce inaccurate or unexpected results. Input data has been modified to create a well-defined polyshape.
Unable to load the saved polyshape because it is incompatible with this version of MATLAB. A polyshape is created using the saved vertices only.
Boundaries with zero enclosed area have been ignored.
Output contains an empty polyshape due to duplicate vertices, intersections, or other inconsistencies.
Output contains an empty array due to duplicate vertices, intersections, or other inconsistencies.
Output polyshape may contain a hole boundary touching a solid boundary.
Boundaries with fewer than 3 points were removed.
The centroid value may be inaccurate because the bounding box of the polyshape is much larger than its area.
Inf is not allowed.
Input data must contain at least 3 vertices.
Wrong parameters.
Array must be 1x2 to represent a point or a vector.
Index is out of range.
The number of points exceeded the comparison limit.
Input data must be an Nx2 array, N>1.
Duplicate indices were found and ignored.
Wrong or unknown input.
Internal error: {0}
